official_title: Concerning compensation for United States assistance to the Soviet Union and successor states.

summary.text: Applauds the political reforms that have occurred in the Soviet Union and its successor states. Urges continued progress toward the creation of a free society. Urges that the provision of assistance to the Soviet Union and its successor states (other than specialized technical assistance to assist in the process of democratization or the creation of a market economy) require compensation or repayment by the recipient.

titles.title: Concerning compensation for United States assistance to the Soviet Union and successor states.
